alert.note: Alert for Leake (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued July 15 at 8:25AM CDT until further notice by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Mississippi... Pearl River At Edinburg affecting Leake County. Pearl River Near Carthage affecting Leake County. For the Upper Pearl River...including Philadelphia, Edinburg, Carthage, Walnut Grove, Lena, Kosciusko, Ratliff`s Ferry, Ofahoma, Jackson...Moderate flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM THIS AFTERNOON UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Pearl River At Edinburg. * WHEN...From this afternoon until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 24.0 feet, Some dirt roads near the river are flooded. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:45 AM CDT Saturday the stage was 17.1 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage late this afternoon and continue rising to a crest of 24.5 feet early Monday morning. - Flood stage is 20.0 feet. && Fld Observed Forecasts (7 am CDT) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Sun Mon Tue Pearl River Edinburg 20.0 17.1 Sat 7 am CDT 23.5 24.4 23.3 &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Forecast includes rainfall on the ground and 24 hours of additional rainfall. Additional information is available at www.water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=JAN The next statement will be issued this evening at 8 PM CDT.
